message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you a chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000.

Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am not able to meet the price of $1,500,000. Would it be possible for you to consider a lower price? I am willing to pay up to $800,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counter-offer.  While I understand your position, the product's value is significantly higher than $800,000. I'm willing to come down to $1,200,000. This is my final offer.

Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I am still unable to meet the price of $1,200,000. I am willing to pay up to $1,050,000 for the product. I hope this aligns closer with your valuation.
